channel.title: Webclient help [Delta]
channel.description:
So I got everything ready just I keep implementing the code in the client class wrong (to dl and read from the cache folder). I am following this turorial http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494.0.html
This is the compiler error I recieve. [code] C:\Users\Patrick\Desktop\Webclient>"C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac. exe" *.java backup_client.java:10: class client is public, should be declared in a file name d client.java public final class client extends Applet_Sub1 { ^ Client.java:10: class client is public, should be declared in a file named clien t.java public final class client extends Applet_Sub1 { ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors
C:\Users\Patrick\Desktop\Webclient>pause Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I also have teamviewer, so if anyone needs to see pm me. Thanks

item.title: Webclient help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @blazer2582 blazer2582
item.description:
@blazer2582 wrote:

backup_client.java:10: class client is public, should be declared in a file name
d client.java
public final class client extends Applet_Sub1 {
^
Client.java:10: class client is public, should be declared in a file named clien
t.java
public final class client extends Applet_Sub1 {

Put backup_client.java somewhere else, in a new folder.
rename Client.java to client.java

Read full topic
